title: Crew Show (Evos, presence, Honda trucks, Q&A) - TST Podcast #656
description:
On this crew show we talk about being more present, 2-door off-roaders, the new Honda Ridgeline, things Raptors are bad at, which car we would turn into a monster truck,  Lancer Evos, answer MANY questions, and give some watch advice.

You get all the cars, one search. Check out https://www.AutoTempest.com/tst so they know we sent you. 

Buy Innova tools at all major automotive retailers, Amazon, and https://www.Innova.com

https://www.NETGEAR.com/bestWiFi with promo code SMOKINGTIRE10 to save 10%. 

 

Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
